text: The 00 and 1 Dalmatians, or The Great Dog Robbery is a 1956 children's novel by Dodie Smith. The story is about Cruella de Vil and her plans to skin 101 Dalmatian puppies to make a fur coat. The puppies are rescued by other animals. Disney released an animated movie in 1961 based on the book as 101 Dalmatians. The book has been published as 101 Dalmatians.Dodie Smith, "101 Dalmatians", Egmont UK Ltd, 1989, . Smith wrote a sequel to the book called The Starlight Barking. == References == Category:English children's books Category:101 Dalmatians Category:1956 books Category:Books about dogs
